p: Previous research on related coronaviruses suggests that these viruses accumulate between 1 and 3 changes in their genome per month (rates of 3 × 10 −4 to 1 × 10 −3 per site per year). Molecular clock calibration estimated the evolutionary rate of the SARS-CoV-2 whole genome sequences at 6.58 × 10 −3 substitutions per site per year (95% HPD: 5.2 × 10 −3 to 8.1 × 10 −3).
